raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual demonstrates a strong preference for high-quality narrative-driven content, favoring themes of drama and emotional depth, often featuring complex characters and intense storytelling. Their ratings consistently reflect enthusiasm for well-acted series and films, as evidenced by numerous 5-star ratings. Key patterns include appreciation for strong character arcs and emotional resonance, although they exhibit fluctuating interest depending on the direction of the plot in ongoing series. 

Regarding content sensitivity, there's a consistent acceptance of mature themes such as violence, substance use, and sexual content, which suggests a preference for gritty realism. This acceptance may correlate with a moderate price sensitivity, as their ratings around quality vary between 2 to 5 stars, hinting at critical discernment based on expectations versus delivery. 

Overall, their core preferences lie in engaging narratives, emotional complexity, and high production quality, with a noticeable sensitivity to storytelling that transforms positively or negatively over time. Their critical reviews reflect both passionate appreciation for creative storytelling when executed well and disappointment in formulaic narratives or abrupt plot changes.

target_interaction.title: Violent
target_interaction.text: Violent and senseless story. Sorry I ever watched it.
